name: hm06
effect: Teaches Rock Smash to a compatible Pokémon.
short_effect: Teaches Dive to a compatible Pokémon. (Gen IV & III: Rock Smash Gen II: Whirlpool)

flavor_text.sun-moon: The user attacks with a punch. This may also lower the target’s Defense stat. This move can also shatter rocks in the field.
flavor_text.ultra-sun-ultra-moon: The user attacks with a punch. This may also lower the target’s Defense stat. This move can also shatter rocks in the field.
flavor_text.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee: The user attacks with a punch. This may also lower the target’s Defense stat. This move can also shatter rocks in the field.
